data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coleman, Charles Oliver, Thurston, Michael H. (2014): A redescription of the type species of Oedicerina Stephensen, 1931 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Oedicerotidae) and the description of two new species. Zoosystematics and Evolution 90 (2): 225-247, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.90.8559, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.90.8559
